pitch.cc: Philip Humber is really trying to keep Carl Crawford close; he is 11-for-16 in stolen base attempts this season.

pitch.cc: That was pitch number 75 for Philip Humber; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .203 average in the first 75 pitches but they hit .328 off him after that.

pitch.cc: Jon Lester may prefer to go after Alexei Ramirez, whose OPS is .725 this season, with the cutter rather than facing Paul Konerko, whose OPS is .923.
Jon Lester is trying to tie up Alexei Ramirez with fastballs inside; Ramirez is hitting .236 on pitches in that location compared to .265 overall.
